segment.source: The goal of deployment planning is to successfully and efficiently deploy a product so that it does not disrupt your users or the network.
segment.target: The goal of deployment planning is to successfully and efficiently deploy a product so that it does not disrupt your users or the network.

segment.source: There are a number of different deployment configurations and prerequisites that you must consider before you create your deployment plan.
segment.target: There are a number of different deployment configurations and prerequisites that you must consider before you create your deployment plan.

segment.source: This section includes information that can help you gather the information that you must have to formulate a deployment plan that best meets your business requirements.
segment.target: This section includes information that can help you gather the information that you must have to formulate a deployment plan that best meets your business requirements.

segment.source: This checklist can be used to help you plan for preparing your computing environment for DaRT 7 deployment.
